data.title: Build Your Insurance Career With A Job At Youi
data.meta_description: Looking for an insurance job that truly means something? View the latest Youi Job openings at Youi Australia. We get you.
data.text:
Passionate

Being Passionate about our purpose is what makes us better than the rest. We are proud to be part of Youi and we live “We are Youi and Youi is us” daily. We take what we do seriously, but we know how to have fun.

Honest

Being Honest is the only way to be - for success, for development, for growth. We tell it like it is, we do what is right even if no one is watching and we speak up if we are concerned. Open, candid culture is who we are.

Awesome Service

Awesome Service is the cornerstone of what makes us successful. We own the moment, go the extra mile, and move fast. We challenge ourselves daily as to how we can provide better service.

Operations

The backbone of Youi and the front line of our business. With a diverse range of roles including customer service, sales, assessing, and more, our dedicated and talented team ensures our customers receive the highest level of support and care.

Marketing

Home to an award-winning team of individuals with various skillsets across digital, media, creative services and more. This team is dedicated to delivering impactful campaigns that resonate with our customers and attract new customers to our brand.

HEAD OF INBOUND SALES

“I feel so fortunate to be involved with an organisation that continues to evolve and embrace such positive change and to challenge the insurance industry”.

Ross joined Youi as a Sales Advisor in 2013. Through his hard work and dedication, he progressed through various development programs and management roles, ultimately becoming the Head of Inbound Sales in 2023.

OPERATIONS PROJECT MANAGER

“My diverse journey at Youi has been an amazing ride, providing me with some incredible chances to learn and grow both personally and professionally.”

Rachel joined Youi in 2018 as a Retention Advisor before moving into the Claims area. In 2020, Rachel was selected for the Ignition Program which led to her appointment as an Operations Project Manager in 2022.

BUSINESS PROCESS ANALYST

“My Youi journey has been amazing. Having seen a wide range of the business both in operations and support, there are so many possibilities available to everyone who works here.”

Neville has held 10 different roles across various departments since joining Youi in 2013. From starting as a Sales Advisor to becoming a Business Analyst, Neville embodies our culture of growth and development.

SERVICE SALES MANAGER

“I’m so grateful to work for a company that invests in its employees’ growth and well-being, and look forward to continuing to learn and develop my career in the years ahead.”

Bonnie joined Youi in 2018 as a Sales Advisor and was accepted into the Ignition Program in 2019. She was promoted to Sales Team Manager in 2020 before accepting a secondment role as an Operations Manager in 2022.

PROPERTY CLAIMS TEAM MANAGER

“I like change, and the movement through the company and departments has been invigorating, as well as enlightening. I have learnt so much through my time in Youi and look forward to the next transition”.

Jeff joined Youi in 2016 and has held various roles in sales and claims. Jeff has successfully completed the Ignition and Acceleration programs and currently serves as a Team Manager within the Home Claims department.

PEOPLE & CULTURE RISK SPECIALIST

“I don’t know what the long-term goal is for me, but I know that if you want to grow and develop yourself – there’s always opportunities with Youi.”

Mary joined us in 2012. She became a PA in 2013, then moved into HR as an Administrator. After completing her studies in 2016, she became a HR Advisor then a HR Business Partner. She is now our People & Culture Risk Specialist.
